DOC.brief_summary: This study single blind ( Outcome Assessors ) , multicenter randomize control study design investigate silver alloy urinary catheter antibacterial property reduce incidence catheter acquire urinary tract infection patient undergo elective surgery . Patients require urinary catheterization randomize two group receive either silver alloy catheter ( test ) silicone catheter ( control ) .
DOC.brief_title: Silver Alloyed Urinary Catheters Incidence Catheter Acquired Urinary Tract Infections ( UTI )
DOC.criteria: Adults elective surgery require urinary catheterization Patients recently ( within 3 week ) urinary catheter Signs urinary tract infection Previous radiation therapy lower pelvis Latex allergy Cognitive impair Do understand Swedish language .
